It's okay to acknowledge that life can get complicated, but we musn't forget the beauty in its simplicity, too. From the multitude of stars above, to freshly mowed grass in the morning, life is simply wonderful.

description1.default: Ben is the head of our small team. He loves walking his dog, Walter, when he has some free time.

description2.default: Alex handles all written content. She enjoys painting and playing softball on the weekends.

description3.default: Sammy is our programmer. You'll usually find her nose in a book. She has a cat named Skitty.
